titleStmt.title: The rape of Lucrece. By Mr. William Shakespeare
titleStmt.author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Roger Iackson, and are to be solde at his shop neere the Conduit in Fleet-street,
